tabList.heading: My Tabs
tabList.tagline: Split bills with friends. Add items, assign people, and send payment requests.
tabList.placeholderEmpty: Type a tab name to create one
tabList.hintCreate: Create a tab to start splitting a bill.

toast.shareFailed: Failed to share bill. Please try again.

tabEditor.hintScan: Scan a receipt to get started
tabEditor.assignHint: Tap items to assign them to {{name}}

scanError.scanLimitReached: You've used all {{limit}} free scans this month. Add your own API key in Profile for unlimited scans.
scanError.noItemsFound: No items found in receipt. Try a clearer photo.
scanError.currencyMismatch: Note: Receipt appears to be in {{detected}}, but this tab uses {{expected}}. Items were added as {{expected}}.

totals.heading: Totals
totals.unassignedWarning_one: {{count}} item not assigned to anyone yet.
totals.unassignedWarning_other: {{count}} items not assigned to anyone yet.

addRabbitModal.title: Add Someone
addRabbitModal.paymentHintSave: Adding payment info saves this rabbit for future tabs.

profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.paymentHint: Set your payment usernames so people can pay you when you share a bill.
profile.currencyHint: New tabs will use this currency by default.

savedRabbits.heading: Saved Rabbits
savedRabbits.empty: No saved rabbits yet. Add payment info when adding someone to a tab and they'll appear here.

advanced.heading: Advanced
advanced.freeScansRemaining: {{remaining}} of {{limit}} free receipt scans remaining this month.
advanced.usingOwnKey: Using your own key — unlimited scans.
advanced.apiKeyHint: Use your own API key for unlimited scans. Stored in your browser only.

steps.createTab: Give your tab a name and hit **New Tab** to start splitting a bill!
steps.scanReceipt: Snap a photo of your receipt to auto-import items
steps.addRabbit: Add the people splitting this bill. You can include their Venmo, Cash App, or PayPal too!
steps.assignItems: Click a person above, then tap their items.
steps.taxTip: Adjust tax and tip — they apply proportionally to each person's share.
steps.profile: Set up your profile with payment handles to send payment requests and share bills.
